availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca Stewart Rogers on October 24, 1854 in Bath County, Kentucky. Father of Othilla Rogers, Spencer Rogers, and Martha Rogers. Served in the 25th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) until December 8, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Bethel, p. 19A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film #000273007, p. 14.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 398.
